sentences.en: Allow me to introduce you to our headmaster.
sentences.cn: 请允许我介绍你见见我们的校长.

sentences.en: Before the door of the headmaster's office,she stopped and re-collected herself for a while.
sentences.cn: 在校长办公室门前，她停步片刻使自己镇静下来。

sentences.en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentences.cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentences.en: He was proposed as a candidate for the headmaster.
sentences.cn: 他被荐举为校长候选人.

sentences.en: He went to see the headmaster on his own initiative.
sentences.cn: 他主动去看望校长.

sentences.en: His succession as headmaster was not in any doubt.
sentences.cn: 他继任校长是确定无疑的.

sentences.en: His track record as a headmaster was excellent.
sentences.cn: 他作为校长的工作履历非常突出。

sentences.en: If only I knew my new headmaster!
sentences.cn: 要是我认识我的新校长就好了！

sentences.en: Our headmaster rattled on for at least two hours at the opening ceremony.
sentences.cn: 我们的校长在开学典礼上唠唠叨叨地讲了至少两个小时。

sentences.en: She sends all her earnings except those for her to live on to headmaster.
sentences.cn: 她将自己的收入除去生活费之后，全部寄给了校长。

sentences.en: The boy was ill at ease in the presence of the headmaster.
sentences.cn: 那男孩在校长面前感到局促不安.

sentences.en: The headmaster elaborated upon the idea for a new school uniform.
sentences.cn: 校长就制作新校服的想法作了说明.

sentences.en: The headmaster is marking the papers.
sentences.cn: 校长正给考卷评分数.

sentences.en: The headmaster is waiting for someone to own up.
sentences.cn: 校长在等着有人站出来承认。

sentences.en: The headmaster ruled the school with a stern discipline.
sentences.cn: 校长治校严谨.

sentences.en: The speaker leveled his remarks at the headmaster.
sentences.cn: 发言人的评论是冲着校长来的.

sentences.en: This headmaster is very modest.
sentences.cn: 这位校长很谦虚。

sentences.en: Under the wise rule of the headmaster, the school flourished.
sentences.cn: 在校长明智的管理下, 这所中学得以发展起来.

sentences.en: We could write a letter to the headmaster.
sentences.cn: 我们不妨给校长写封信.

sentences.en: You need a thick skin to be a headmaster.
sentences.cn: 要当校长，你就得脸皮厚一些。

trans.tran_en: a male teacher who is in charge of a school
